en.submittedAppStatusMsg: Your application was submitted on {{ case.createdDate | date }}
en.submittedAppStatusMsgDetails2: You’ll be given a full case number when your application has been accepted and issued (sent by post to your {{ divorceWho }}).
en.submittedWhatHappensNextDetails1: If your application is accepted you’ll be sent a copy by email along with your case number.
en.submittedWhatHappensNextDetails2: Your {{ divorceWho }} will also receive a copy of the application by post and a form to return. If you have used adultery as your reason for divorce, and named the person that your {{ divorceWho }} committed adultery with, they will also get a copy and a form to return.
en.submittedWhatHappensNextDetails3: Contact the service centre if you don’t hear anything back after 4 weeks.

cy.submittedAppStatusMsg: Cyflwynwyd eich cais ar {{ case.createdDate | date }}
cy.submittedAppStatusMsgDetails2: Byddwch yn cael eich rhif achos iawn pan fydd eich cais wedi cael ei dderbyn a’i gyhoeddi (pan fydd wedi'i anfon drwy'r post at eich {{ divorceWho }}).
cy.submittedWhatHappensNextDetails1: Os bydd eich cais yn cael ei dderbyn fe gewch gopi ohono drwy e-bost ynghyd â'ch rhif achos iawn.
cy.submittedWhatHappensNextDetails2: Bydd eich{{ divorceWho }} hefyd yn cael copi o’r cais drwy'r post a ffurflen i’w dychwelyd. Os mai godineb yw eich rheswm dros ysgaru, a’ch bod wedi enwi’r unigolyn y godinebodd eich {{ divorceWho }} ag ef/hi, bydd ef/hi yn cael copi hefyd a ffurflen i’w dychwelyd.
cy.submittedWhatHappensNextDetails3: Cysylltwch â ni os na fyddwch wedi clywed gennym ar ôl 4 wythnos.
